## Pull Request Checklist

Please fill in the checklist before requesting review. This helps reviewers and keeps the repo consistent.

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines.
- [ ] My change is focused and small (one logical change per PR).
- [ ] I have added or updated tests where applicable.
- [ ] I have added or updated documentation where applicable.
- [ ] I ran the test suite locally and it passes: `npm test`.
- [ ] I ran linters/formatters: `npm run format` and `npm run lint:fix`.
- [ ] I requested reviewers and/or assigned code owners.

### Summary

Describe the change and why it is needed. Link related issues/PRs if any.

### Implementation notes

Any implementation notes, caveats, or decisions made during development.
